Package Services

Class MapService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.MapService
  • public class MapService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs all the Map Operations.

                   java.lang.String p_loadFileName)
            throws InvalidMap
        The loadmap method process map file.
        Parameters:
        p_gameState - current state of game.
        p_loadFileName - map file name.
        Returns:
        Map object after processing map file.
        Throws:
        InvalidMap - indicates Map Object Validation failure

      • addOrRemoveContinents

        public Map addOrRemoveContinents​(GameState p_gameState,
                                 Map p_mapToBeUpdated,
                                 java.lang.String p_operation,
                                 java.lang.String p_argument)
                          throws InvalidMap
        Method to construct updated Continents list based on passed operations - Add/Remove and Arguments.
        Parameters:
        p_gameState - Current GameState Object
        p_mapToBeUpdated - Map Object to be Updated
        p_operation - Operation to perform on Continents
        p_argument - Arguments pertaining to the operations
        Returns:
        List of updated continents
        Throws:
        InvalidMap - invalidmap exception

      • editFunctions

        public void editFunctions​(GameState p_gameState,
                          java.lang.String p_argument,
                          java.lang.String p_operation,
                          java.lang.Integer p_switchParameter)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          InvalidMap,
                          InvalidCommand
        Controls the Flow of Edit Operations: editcontinent, editcountry, editneighbor.
        Parameters:
        p_gameState - Current GameState Object.
        p_argument - Arguments for the pertaining command operation.
        p_operation - Add/Remove operation to be performed.
        p_switchParameter - Type of Edit Operation to be performed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception.
        InvalidMap - invalidmap exception.
        InvalidCommand - invalid command exception
